The following bugs in omniORBpy 1.5 have been fixed. Update from CVS to get the fixes.

Summary: Bug in omniidl output with certain Windows filenames (bug number 1)
Date: Thu Jul 4 14:03:08 BST 2002
Fixed by: dgrisby
Reported by: Richard Gruet
Description: Filenames with \ characters could be interpreted as having \ escape characters, upsetting the Python parser.
